\Aura\View\Escaper

\Aura\View\EscaperObject

A decorator to return escaped values from objects/arrays/etc.

__escape()

__escape(mixed $raw) : mixed

Returns an escaped value.

Parameters

mixed $raw

The value to escape. If a string, uses htmlspecialchars(); if an array, recursively escapes keys and values; if an object, wraps it in an escaper; otherwise, does not escape (e.g. numerics, resources, bools, nulls, etc.).

Returns

mixed

Tags

None found
